fields.name: The Well of the Great Ones
fields.description: Beware, adventurer, for an eldritch cult has invaded the Arcosian Swamp, intent on awakening the Great Old Ones from their aeons of slumber. Journey to the heart of the swamp and stop their plans before it is too late!
fields.intro_text:
"Evenhold is in great danger!" Moloch, emissary of the Court of Tanjid, confides to you over cups at the Main Hall bar. "Signs of impending doom are all about us. Last week a serpent with two heads was killed down by the stables. The week before, a madwoman reported seeing her son, who was three weeks dead, stalking the hills above the vast Arcosian Swamp. She claims to have followed him until he vanished into the heart of that stinking hell hole.

"Now a plague of swamp rats is swarming over the city. If the city can't control their number, there won't be enough left in the city's granaries to feed half the populace through the coming winter."

Molochâ€™s haggard expression convinces you of the depth of his concern. Staring directly into your eyes, he continues, "The trouble seems to be emanating from the swamp. I sent scouts in there, but none returned. Late last night, I was contacted by, let us say, an unexpected source. I have learned that deep within the Arcosian lies a temple, an eldritch place of aeon-ridden evil. A madman now seeks there to reopen that which should never be."

---

Moloch grasps your hand and places an odd-looking amulet in it. "My night callers left this with me in hopes that I might find an adventurer brave enough to enter that place of the damned and help put an end to the evil. When used, the amulet will transport you to the edge of the swamp. It will also bring you back to the Main Hall." Moloch pauses to swill from his tankard before continuing.

"You will find a skiff waiting at the pier. Proceed north to the temple and do not stray from the channel. Once there, seek out the Elder Sign, for it is an item of great power and may help to seal the gate that the evil one seeks to open. My sources also speak of a golden statue, believed to contain some great eldritch magic. Destroy it if you can. Beware the guardians lest they bite and catch. Destroy the evil one ere he looses those bound in aeons past. His hour of triumph is nearly come, for when the stars are right, the Great Old Ones will rise again."

Rising abruptly, Moloch says, "I depart for Tanjid tonight to report to the high councilor. It is up to you now." He dons his cloak but turns back for one last caution before leaving.

"Words of power can release tremendous forces, good and evil. To bind forces once unleashed may require reversal. But remember, the act of acquiring knowledge may be hazardous if the knowledge serves the great old ones. Now, each of us must be going before it is too late." With a flourish of his cloak, he departs.

---

Slowly you stand, the amulet clenched tightly in your fist. As you concentrate on its shiny surface, there's a blinding flash of light and you feel a lurching sensation. When your vision clears, you find yourself standing at the edge of the Arcosian Swamp.

You wait for several minutes while your stomach makes the trip that the rest of you has already made.

fields.name: in the Well of the Great Ones
fields.description: Cool green waters close over your head as you sink deeper and deeper. Then, you realize that you are not alone. Two evil immense beings rise out of the depths, thrusting you upward.

fields.name: on the platform of the well (N/S/E/W/D)
fields.description: Ageless and evil, the Cyclopean platform that you stand on seems to beckon you down to its center. There, like a blaspheming mouth, yawns the Well of the Great Ones. Steps lead away from the well to the north, south, east, and west.

fields.name: on the north side of the well (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the north, the tangled unclean bulk of the Arcosian swamp calls out to you. To the south, rising out of the swamp, is a set of stone steps leading to the top of a truncated pyramid that holds the well. Paths lead east and west, curving around the outside of the well.

fields.name: on the east side of the well (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the east, the abysmal depths of the swamp stretch out before you. To the west, a short flight of steps leads up to the Cyclopean platform of the well. North and south, a path continues around the edge of the platform.

fields.name: on the south side of the Well (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the north lies a truncated pyramid that embraces the Well of the Great Ones. A short flight of steps leads to the top of the platform. To the south, a rope bridge spans the raging torrent of the river. East and west are paths that lead around the outside of the platform.

fields.name: on the west side of the well (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the west, beckons the murmuring heart of the Arcosian. To the east, a short flight of steps that leads to the top of the platform containing the well. Paths lead north and south around the outside of the platform.

fields.name: a rope bridge (N/S/D)
fields.description: The rickety rope bridge sways with each step, threatening to tumble you into the raging torrent. To the south lies the temple. To the north, you see an ancient stone structure that radiates unspeakable power. Below you is the churning water of the river.

fields.name: in the river
fields.description: The dark torrent bears you along at a terrific pace. Slowly, your arms grow weary of the struggle to stay on top of the water. As you sink beneath the surface, you curse your luck and the great ones.

fields.name: the north side of the temple (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the north, a swaying rope bridge is the only way to cross a raging river that runs from the east to the west as far as you can see. To the south, twin bronze doors mark the north entrance to the temple. East and west are paths that curve around the outside of the temple.

fields.name: the east side of the temple (N/S/E)
fields.description: To the west lies an obsidian, pyramid-shaped temple. The walls are smooth, allowing no entry from this side. To the east, beckons the vast Arcosian Swamp. Paths to the north and south curve around the outside of the temple.

fields.name: the south side of the temple (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the south, a stone path leads to a small outbuilding. Light streams from its open door. To the north, a black pyramid rises out of the swamp. Bronze double doors lead into its dark heart. The stone path continues east and west around the sides of the temple.

fields.name: the west side of the temple (N/S/W)
fields.description: To the east lies an obsidian, pyramid-shaped temple. The smooth walls allow no entrance from this side. To the west, you see the gibbous moon high over the Arcosian Swamp. Stone paths lead north and south, around the outside of the temple.

fields.name: a path south of a temple (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: North, like some nightmare mountain, the black pyramid squats malignantly. South of you is the entrance to a low, one-story building. The door stands open. East and west are paths around the outside of the building.

fields.name: the laboratory (N/S/D)
fields.description: The flicker of torchlight reveals a long single room. Oak shelves filled with clay jars line the east and west walls. A stone platform rests in the center of the room. Its sides bear an intricate carved inscription. Doors to the north and south lead outside. Behind some boxes, a narrow, disused earthen tunnel leads down into inky darkness.

fields.name: the east side of the lab (N/S/E)
fields.description: To the west, lies the outer wall of a small stone building. To the east lies the tangled mangroves of the Arcosian Swamp. Paths lead north and south around the sides of the building.

fields.name: at the entrance to a stone lab (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the north, the door to a single story building stands open. Light streams out of the doorway. To the south, a gravel path leads to the stone pier that marks the end of the canal. Paths lead east and west around the sides of the building.

fields.name: the west side of the lab (N/S/W)
fields.description: To the east lies the outer wall of a small stone building. West lies the fetid reaches of the swamp. Paths lead north and south around the sides of the building.

fields.name: on a stone pier (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an old stone pier at the north end of a sluggish, overgrown canal. The canal stretches to the south, partially blocked by the mangroves of the swamp. To the north, a stone building sits in the middle of a gravel path. East and west are the depths of the fetid swamp.

fields.name: poling along an ancient canal (N/S)
fields.description: Impending mangroves crowd the channel. Dark horrific shapes disturb the water around the skiff. Clouds of insects buzz about your head. North and south of you, the serpentine channel continues.

fields.name: the canal mouth (N/S)
fields.description: The cries of night creatures assume a frantically rhythmical quality as if to warn you of the dark haunted depths of the swamp. North, a narrow channel winds into the Arcosian Swamp.

fields.name: on a rotting pier (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: Slimy boards creak as you step onto the pier. To the north, you see the mouth of an overgrown canal. South, a hummock rises out of the marsh lit by the last dying rays of sunset. East and west are the tangled vegetation of the Arcosian Swamp.

fields.name: a small hummock (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are on the edge of a vast primeval swamp. Light fails quickly as the sun sets. The chorusing of frogs and insects is almost deafening. To the south you see a road out of this horrid place. To the east and west are thick swamp vegetation. To the north lies a decaying pier, a sturdy skiff, and your fate...

fields.name: wandering in the swamp
fields.description: The matted tangle of mangroves closes around you. You advance only with great difficulty. Furtive wild things rustle in the undergrowth. Swarms of insects drone incessantly in your ears. If you only can get your bearings, everything will be all right.

fields.name: in the entryway of the temple (N/S)
fields.description: Silence seems a palpable entity here. To the north is a hideously carven door. To the south, twin bronze doors mark the exit to the outside. On the east and west walls are tapestries depicting horrific beings devouring worlds. The cloying scent of decomposing flesh reaches your nostrils.
fields.dark_description: You stumble through the deep shadows of the temple. A faint trickle of moonlight slips through the heavy double doors to the south, too dim to reveal any details. If there are other means of egress, they are concealed by the palpable gloom. You hear the horrid sounds of things moving in the darkness.

fields.name: in the great hall of the temple (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: Crimson and black columns rise toward the dark recesses of the hall's vaulted ceiling. North, a raised dais awaits your approach. South, an evilly carved door leads to the entryway. There are doors in the east and west walls.

fields.name: the dais of the great hall (N/S/E/W/D)
fields.description: A throne squats malignantly near the center of the dais. A crimson pedestal sits west, and an ebon pedestal sits east of the throne. There are doors in the north, east, and west walls, and steps to the south leading to the great hall. A stone stairway burrows down into the inky depths below the temple. You hear faint moaning and meeping sounds from that direction.

fields.name: the dining hall (E/W)
fields.description: Long low tables and benches are arranged around the room. To the west is the great hall. East, a low arch leads to a darkened room.

fields.name: the kitchen (W)
fields.description: A great fireplace fills the east wall. A long counter juts out from the north wall. Above it hangs a rack of kitchen utensils, including a nasty-looking meat cleaver. The pungent scent of spices fills the room. There is an arch in the west wall.

fields.name: the guardroom (E/W)
fields.description: The room smells strongly of stale sweat. Several wooden stools and tables are scattered about the place. There are doors in the east and west walls.

fields.name: the armory (w)
fields.description: The walls of this room are lined with weapon racks. A large grinding wheel occupies the southeast corner. A single door stands open in the west wall.

fields.name: the north dormitory (S/E/W)
fields.description: A long row of narrow cots occupy the western half of the room. There is a low arch in the south wall leading to an adjoining room. A door in the east wall leads back to the throne room. Another door stands closed on the west wall.

fields.name: the inner sanctum (S/E)
fields.description: Rich tapestries adorn the walls of this room. An ornate desk occupies the west wall. A large canopy bed rests against the north wall. Doors lead east and south.

fields.name: the south dormitory (N/E/W)
fields.description: Tapestries of horrific design adorn the walls of this room. Soft cots are lined up along the western wall. There is a low arch in the north, and a door in the east and west walls.

fields.name: the storeroom (N/E)
fields.description: Pine shelves line the walls of this room. Crates of provisions are stacked along the south wall, containing all the needs for ten adventurers for a week. A rat noticing you flees out the exit. Doors lead north and east.

fields.name: a secret passageway (N/E)
fields.description: The narrow claustrophobic passage winds between massive stone blocks. A single trail of footprints in the dust at your feet indicate that the passage has been recently used. There are narrow doors in the east and in the north.

fields.name: the entrance to the crypts (E/W/S/U/D)
fields.description: Spread out before you and running to the east and west as far as you can see are the crypts of the temple. Above you, ancient stone steps lead up to the temple. South, a foul smelling pit lies open like an obscene mouth waiting to swallow you.
fields.dark_description: You are in the deep darkness of the crypts below the temple. You can't see anything, but you can smell decaying flesh and hear the groans and meeps of unspeakable creatures nearby.

fields.name: the crypt of pain (N/S/E/W/D)
fields.description: The dank clammy air seems to aggravate every wound, new or old, that you have ever suffered. A sick cloying odor issues from all around you. East and west, the crypts continue. North, a cell door awaits. South, a deep, dank pit yawns in the floor.
fields.dark_description: It is too dark to see, but your nostrils are assaulted by a sick, cloying odor that issues from all around you. You cringe at the sound of scampering feet and distant voices in the darkness.

fields.name: the crypt of remorse (S/W/D)
fields.description: In the darkness, you realize what a mess you have made of your life. Better that you die here and now, than to continue this mockery of an existence. South, a slimy pit awaits invitingly. West, the crypts continue.
fields.dark_description: You are deep within the earth. It is too dark to see. You are overcome with a feeling of remorse.

fields.name: a slimy pit (U)
fields.description: Heaps of refuse cover the floor of the pit. Its walls are smooth, but you might be able to scramble up if you are careful enough.

fields.name: a dank pit (U)
fields.description: The foul odor here nearly overcomes you. Does it come from the dripping walls or perhaps from some noisome occupant? The only exit is to climb up the slippery walls.

fields.name: a deep pit (S)
fields.description: Cold and deep, the pit kindles within you a yearning for bright sunlight and wholesome companionship. Far above, you see the rim of the pit, too high to climb. You see an indentation in the south wall, possibly a way out.
fields.dark_description: You are at the bottom of a pit. It is too dark to see anything. Feeling around, you think there is an opening to the south.

fields.name: a loathsome pit (U)
fields.description: The filth-encrusted walls seem to close in on you. The chill here is the chill of the tomb. You feel buried, buried alive. The only escape is to try to climb the steep walls.
fields.dark_description: You are deep in a pit. It is too dark to tell if there is any way out.

fields.name: a noisome pit (U)
fields.description: The pit has the charnel odor of an open grave. You sense here an ageless evil presence. Your fingers grasp your weapon tightly. You notice a slight depression in the floor of the pit.
fields.dark_description: You are at the bottom of a pit. It is too dark to tell if there is any way out.

fields.name: the crypt of regret (S/E/D)
fields.description: The hour is late, very late. So little time remains. These endless adventures, where have they led you? The noisome pit to the south waits mockingly. East, the crypts await your return.
fields.dark_description: By the ghastly smell of the place, you are in the crypts below the temple. It is too dark to tell which way you can go.

fields.name: the crypt of sorrow (N/S/E/W/D)
fields.description: Silent, you stand. The air surrounding you is filled with the spirits of lost companions. It would be wonderful to join them at last. South, a loathsome pit yawns evilly. North, a cell door beckons to you. East and west, the crypts continue.
fields.dark_description: You are in the crypts below the temple. The air is rank with the smell of death. It is too dark to see anything.

fields.name: a dank cell (S)
fields.description: The cell seems very cramped. Against the back wall, three forms huddle in the shadows. A bowl of decomposed flesh sits in the center of the floor. South, the cell door stands open.

fields.name: a damp cell (S)
fields.description: There is but one exit from this cell, a door to the south. Deep shadows in the back of the cell do not conceal the two dark shapes lurking there. You can hear chains rattle.

fields.name: the entrance to a tunnel (U/D)
fields.description: This tunnel appears to have been freshly dug. In its narrow confines, you must walk stooped over. Above you is the exit. The tunnel continues downward reaching deeper into the earth.
fields.dark_description: You are in a deep, dark tunnel that seems to slope upward and downward. It is too dark to make out any details.

fields.name: a dark tunnel (U/D)
fields.description: This newly finished tunnel continues, sloping upward and downward. Scattered about the floor are a few old bones. Below you is a junction in the tunnel.
fields.dark_description: You are in a narrow tunnel with earthen walls. It is too dark to see.

fields.name: a junction in the tunnel (W/U)
fields.description: Here, the tunnel joins a huge ancient passageway. The way east is blocked by a recent cave in. The way west is open, but the thick dust on the floor seems to indicate that it hasn't been used for centuries.
fields.dark_description: You are in a pitch-black tunnel. It is too dark to see anything.

fields.name: an ancient passageway (E/W)
fields.description: The passageway leads into the darkness and appears disused. You feel a sense of impending doom. Who could have dug this tunnel and why?
fields.dark_description: The tunnel is wider here, but still too dark to see anything.

fields.name: an ancient passageway (E/W)
fields.description: Here, the passageway grows even larger. Bloated, corpulent, it continues. In the distance, you glimpse the tunnel's end.
fields.dark_description: The tunnel is wider here, but still too dark to see anything.

fields.name: the tunnel terminus (E)
fields.description: Here, the passageway is blocked by an immense brick wall. The odd, tightly-mortared hexagonal bricks are made of a grayish-green material. There is a mystical inscription engraved on each brick in an archaic dialect.
fields.dark_description: The tunnel is wider here, but still too dark to see anything. You feel along what you think is the west wall, and it appears to be bricked up. As your fingers touch the engravings on the bricks, it sends a chill down your spine.

fields.name: the north entryway
fields.description: You are at the north entrance to the temple. There are signs here of a recent battle. Tapestries hang in tatters. Dried blood is smeared on the floor and walls. To the north, twin bronze doors lead outside. South, an ivory door beckons. A stairway goes up.
fields.dark_description: You are in the temple. It is too dark to make out any details. A faint glimmer of moonlight comes through double doors to the north. There might be other passageways, but you can't see them.

fields.name: a landing (W/U/D)
fields.description: The stairs continue upward to the east, and return downward to the south. There is a plain wooden door in the west wall.
fields.dark_description: You seem to be on a landing in the middle of a stairway, but it's too dark to tell. Better find some light before you hurt yourself.

fields.name: the library (E)
fields.description: You are in a large library filled with shelves of eldritch tomes. Arranged around the room are several oak tables and chairs. Each table has an inkwell, quills, and paper. On a central podium rests a massive iron bound book. It is open. The writing seems to be some form of invocation. A door leads east.
fields.dark_description: You are in a dark room. You feel bookshelves on the walls and nearly trip over a table.

fields.name: the top of the stairs (S/D)
fields.description: You are in a long hallway at the top of the stairs. In the west wall is the stairway, which will take you down to a landing. The hallway continues south toward a door.
fields.dark_name: at the top of the stairs
fields.dark_description: You are at the top of the stairs. It is too dark to see anything.

fields.name: an alcove (N/S)
fields.description: You are in an alcove on the north side of a large room. An open door in the north leads to a dark hallway. To the south, heavy, dark drapes hang across an entryway.

fields.name: the chapel (N/S/U)
fields.description: You are in a grotesque chapel lit by guttering candles. Arranged in the room are seven rows of oak pews, carved with evil designs. A brown-stained altar rests against the south wall. Above it is a dark niche, just big enough to step into. West, a stair goes upward. To the north is an alcove and a door.

fields.name: the platform of summoning (D)
fields.description: The spiral staircase has led you to a stone platform high up on the north face of the pyramid. In the distance to the north, you see the Well of the Great Ones, a dark pool surrounded by a stone platform. The view of the well in the moonlight is haunting. You can imagine the surface of the water as a window to another dimension.

fields.name: a dark passage (N/U)
fields.description: The tunnel stretches out as far as you can see. A thick carpet of dust suggests that none have recently passed. Above lies the laboratory, to the north is only blackness.
fields.dark_description: You are in the dark. It is utterly silent here. Feeling the walls, you think there is a passage north. A faint glimmer comes from above. Maybe a way out?

fields.name: wandering in the swamp
fields.description: The matted tangle of mangroves closes around you. You advance only with great difficulty. Swarms of insects drone incessantly in your ears. If you only can get your bearings, everything will be all right.

fields.name: wandering in the swamp
fields.description: The matted tangle of mangroves closes around you. You advance only with great difficulty. Swarms of insects drone incessantly in your ears. If you only can get your bearings, everything will be all right.

fields.name: a niche above the altar (N)
fields.description: This tightly cramped space leaves no room to turn around. As you twist to look around, something scrapes along your ribcage painfully. The altar is north, the only exit.

fields.name: gold statuette
fields.description: Carven from solid gold is an obscene nightmare with a fish-like body surrounded by horrible tentacles and surmounted by a fierce reptilian head. Its scaly form is grotesque and repellent. It seems that the sculptor must have been mad.

fields.name: iron bound book of the T'zzanti
fields.description: Open before you is a book bound with cold iron. The cunningly wrought clasp might be hard to open were it latched. The thin leaves are of a finely tanned hide that could be human skin...

fields.name: writing
fields.description: Oh companion of the night, thou who revels in the baying of hounds and spilt blood. Come forth bringing terror to the world. Ai ai, Yog-Sothoth is the gate. By the doom of R'yleh, come forth.

fields.name: Elder Sign
fields.description: Before you is a carved stone depicting a five pointed star, in the center of which is a symbol of an eye surmounted by a pillar of flame. The air of evil filling this place seems to fade while you hold this powerful icon.

fields.name: mystical inscription
fields.description: The inscription seems to be in an eldritch tongue that resembles the writings you have encountered above. It reads, "AI AI Y'GOLONAC EXPERGEFECI AI AI"

fields.name: intricate carving
fields.description: Yog-sothoth vigor commutare pulvis ai ai

fields.name: amulet
fields.description: An amulet finely wrought with gold and silver is resting in your hand. The dark violet stone gives off a faint bluish glow.

fields.name: golden torque
fields.description: Around the Byakhee's neck was a beautifully wrought torque made of solid gold. It is a fine example of Dwarven craftsmanship. You wonder what became of the original owner.

fields.name: silver chain
fields.description: On the floor lies a chain of pure silver. Its shimmering links remind you of fine Elven artistry. How did it come to be around such a throat?

fields.name: mound of blue powder
fields.description: In the trough of the table is a mound of blue powder, smelling faintly of spices and mold.

fields.name: crimson pedestal
fields.description: Pulsing slowly with an eerie inner glow, the smooth scarlet surface of the crimson pedestal is blemished only by a fine crack running its entire length. It might have been the result of an attempt to destroy the pedestal.

fields.name: brass hilted dagger
fields.description: A plain brass hilted dagger begrimed by a layer of swamp filth. Cleaned up, it would be serviceable enough.

fields.name: obsidian dagger
fields.description: A razor edged dagger of obsidian stained by a layer of what could be dried blood. With a little polishing it would be a fine useful weapon.

fields.name: new torch
fields.description: The torch, a length of pinewood with the larger end wrapped tightly with a pitch soaked strip of cloth, looks like it will last for about two hours.

fields.name: iron sword
fields.description: A black two-handed sword with a notched blade and a cracked grip appears to have seen a great deal of use.

fields.name: old torch
fields.description: You see an old torch with a scorched head, indicating that it has been burning for a while. It might have a few minutes of fuel left.

fields.name: oil lamp
fields.description: You see an engraved lamp of burnished brass with a large reservoir full of oil. It will give off light for several hours.

fields.name: rope
fields.description: You see a sturdy hemp rope used for hauling the anchor up and down. It appears to be in good condition.

fields.name: rotting barge
fields.description: An ancient barge floats half submerged in the water. Heaps of rubbish littering the deck include rotted sails, torn nets, a coiled anchor rope, and broken oars.

fields.name: splitting axe
fields.description: A huge meat cleaver with a heavy blade used for the splitting of carcasses. Its notched blade and worn grips allude to its frequent use in the past.

fields.name: rack of kitchen utensils
fields.description: Hanging from an iron rack is a group of tools used in the preperation of food. There is a set of tongs,a duck press,a spice grinder, a splitting axe, and a large ladel.

fields.name: fireplace
fields.description: The stone interior of the fireplace contains the dying embers of a recent fire.

fields.name: stone platform
fields.description: In the center of the room is a waist-high stone platform decorated with intricate words of a forgotten tongue. A depression roughly the size and shape of a human being is recessed in the top.

fields.name: oak shelves
fields.description: The oak shelves are fastened to the wall by iron brackets. Hundreds of sealed jars rest upon the shelves.

fields.name: sealed jars
fields.description: Each of the clay jars is filled with a fine bluish powder. This dust smells of mold and aromatic spices.

fields.name: dark shapes
fields.description: Gliding through the water are several huge estuarian crocodiles. Their dark shapes convince you that swimming is not a healthy form of exercise in the Arcosian Swamp.

fields.name: sturdy skiff
fields.description: You see a well-built skiff rigged for sailing as well as for poling in the shallows of the swamp. You are surprised that the unguarded craft hasn't disappeared ere now.

fields.name: carven door
fields.description: The portal to the north is carven with the likeness of a man's face. Its twisted features imply knowledge of such horrific scope and import that madness was the result.

fields.name: altar
fields.description: At the south end of the room is a waist high block of granite carved in in some weirdly non-Euclidean fashion. A deep channel in the stone is filled with a reddish-black, sticky residue. You don't want to know what it is.

fields.name: throne of bone
fields.description: Atop the dais rests an obscene, towering throne, made wholly from human skulls. Its white, bleached back reaches a height of eight feet. You wonder at the cruelty of the potentates that once ruled from this malevolent ziggurat.

fields.name: weapon racks
fields.description: Sturdy racks of oak stand here, meant to hold all sorts of weapons. You notice that they are mostly empty.

fields.name: dice
fields.description: A pair of beautifully made ivory dice sit on the table. As you roll them, you notice a marked tendency for them to always end up on seven.

fields.name: rich tapestries
fields.description: You see some expensive silk tapestries depicting the night time sky. As you gaze at the stars depicted, you notice that the constellations are displayed from a different angle of perspective than would be available on Eamon. The very thought makes you sweat.

fields.name: horrific tapestries
fields.description: Adorning the walls are silk tapestries showing mad designs that depict humans kneeling before a demonic, inhuman nightmare. Rivers of blood and mountains of skulls complete this wild Plutonian landscape.

fields.name: secret passage south
fields.description: Behind the crates, you find a secret door leading to the south!

fields.name: bowl
fields.description: A ceramic dish sits here, containing several pounds of decaying flesh. A faint name appears on the side: "Rover".

fields.name: inkwells
fields.description: You see four ceramic inkwells with tight fitting metal lids. Three contain ink, the other is empty.

fields.name: quills
fields.description: Next to the inkwells are four goose quills that are good quality.

fields.name: drapes
fields.description: Heavy curtains made of black velvet hang over the archway to the south.

fields.name: mound of dust
fields.description: On the floor is a small dustheap made up of a fine bluish powder.

fields.name: pile of blue powder
fields.description: On the floor is a strange heap of blue powder. It smells faintly of mold and old spices.

fields.name: pile of blue powder
fields.description: On the floor is a mound of blue powder smelling of mold and old spices.

fields.name: heap of blue powder
fields.description: You see a nasty pile of blue powder, smelling of spices and mold.

fields.name: mound of blue powder
fields.description: This powder is all that remains of a zombie.

fields.name: mound of blue powder
fields.description: You see a pile of powder that once was a dreaded zombie.

fields.name: mound of blue powder
fields.description: You see a pile of powder that once was a dreaded zombie.

fields.name: mound of blue powder
fields.description: You see a pile of powder that once was a dreaded zombie.

fields.name: mound of blue powder
fields.description: You see a pile of powder that once was a dreaded zombie.

fields.name: mound of blue powder
fields.description: You see a pile of powder is all that remains of a zombie.

fields.name: mound of blue powder
fields.description: You see a pile of powder is all that remains of a zombie.

fields.name: pile of blue powder
fields.description: On the floor is a strange heap of blue powder. It smells faintly of mold and old spices.

fields.name: mound of dust
fields.description: You see a small dustheap made up of a fine bluish powder.

fields.name: dead Byakhee
fields.description: Dissolving slowly is a putrid mass that once was a flying nightmare.

fields.name: dead Byakhee
fields.description: Dissolving slowly is a putrid mass that once was a flying nightmare.

fields.name: dead Byakhee
fields.description: Dissolving slowly is a putrid mass that once was a flying nightmare.

fields.name: dead Star Vampire
fields.description: Dissolving slowly is a putrid mass that once was a flying nightmare.

fields.name: dead Byakhee
fields.description: Dissolving slowly is a putrid mass that once was a flying nightmare.

fields.name: dead blob
fields.description: At your feet lies a stinking mass that is all that remains of the blob.

fields.name: dead shambler
fields.description: A quaking insectile-anthropoid carcass lies on the ground here. It is no longer a danger to you.

fields.name: dead imam
fields.description: The withered corpse of the dead imam still retains a faint lavender glow.

fields.name: dead Fidavi
fields.description: Slashed to ribbons, the corpse doesn't seem as threatening now.

fields.name: dead Aziz
fields.description: Pierced and bloody, Aziz is no threat now.

fields.name: dead Hiram
fields.description: Pierced and bloody, Hiram is no threat now.

fields.name: dead Abid
fields.description: A bloody corpse lies slumped against the wall.

fields.name: dead Rashid
fields.description: A bloody corpse lies slumped against the wall.

fields.name: dead Aldo
fields.description: The acolyte's body, curled up in the fetal position, seems almost childlike.

fields.name: dead Waldo
fields.description: The acolyte's body, curled up in the fetal position, seems almost childlike.

fields.name: dead Naldo
fields.description: The acolyte's body, curled up in the fetal position, seems almost childlike.

fields.name: dead Bob
fields.description: The acolyte's body, curled up in the fetal position, seems almost childlike.

fields.name: dead ghoul
fields.description: Curled at your feet, the dog-like remains of the ghoul make you shudder.

fields.name: unhappy ghoul
fields.description: Crouched before you is a creature that seems to combine the aspects of both dog and man. Grave mold is matted in its fur and its manacles rattle as it moves.

fields.name: forlorn ghoul
fields.description: Whining and crouching, a dog-like being awaits your approach. Cruel chains bind him to the wall.

fields.name: R. U. Pickman's ghoul
fields.description: Perched on its haunches, a large somber creature awaits your approach. Its face is inscrutable. Its manacles seem to be firmly in place.

fields.name: ghoul leader
fields.description: Leaning dejectedly against the wall, is a huge ghoul. It sniffs the air at your approach.you wonder if the manacles that bind it are strong enough to stop him if he charges.

fields.name: heavy wooden chest
fields.description: A well-built wooden chest rests in front of you. It does not appear to be locked at all.

fields.name: jewels
fields.description: You see a a king's ransom of jewels, all assembled in a pile of glittering wonder. There are many types of precious stones, including diamonds, rubies, emeralds, and a few others you can't even identify.

fields.name: shapeless lump of gold
fields.description: You see a formless lump of gold that might have once been a statue. No doubt, it retains a great deal of its original value and is still worth bringing along.

fields.name: ebon pedestal
fields.description: Black as the void of interstellar space, the ebon pedestal is a squat, malignant column covered by lurid hieroglyphics that seem to dance or crawl along the highly polished stone.

fields.name: secret passage west
fields.description: Behind the tapestries, you discover a secret door leading west into the darkness.

fields.name: camel jerky
fields.description: On a shelf, you see a box of your favorite snack, camel jerky.

fields.name: secret passage north
fields.description: Hidden behind the canopy bed, you see a secret door leading north!

fields.name: secret passage down
fields.description: You find a hidden passage leading down into the cold, damp earth!

fields.name: brass key
fields.description: The Byakhee was carrying a brass key on a chain around its neck.

fields.name: scimitar
fields.description: You see a rusty scimitar with dried blood on the blade.

fields.name: cutlass
fields.description: You see a naval officer's cutlass with a pearl-inlaid hilt.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see a good-quality, razor-sharp sword.

fields.name: Fist of Nodens
fields.description: A war hammer with a leather-wrapped grip is before you. A brief runic phrase is inscribed on the stone head. It translates as: "Fist of Nodens"

fields.name: desk
fields.description: Along the west wall of the room is an ancient, battered desk covered in dust. Old, yellowed papers are strewn about the top with shaky writing scrawled on them.

fields.name: papers
fields.description: On the desk, under a layer of dust, are some papers that appear to be the journal of some long-lost cult member.

fields.name: dead ghoul
fields.description: Curled at your feet, the dog-like remains of the ghoul make you shudder.

fields.name: dead ghoul
fields.description: Curled at your feet, the dog-like remains of the ghoul make you shudder.

fields.text: As the stone disappears into the depths, the surface begins to pitch and roil as if titanic bodies were locked in combat deep below. Lightning strikes the well, sending the deathly waters spraying up into the air.
The piles of dust around you coalesce into groaning zombies!
With a shriek, the zombie collapses into a mound of bluish dust.
You hear a muted roar and the sound of splintering bricks.
Ghoul meeps at you.
Ghoul glibbers at you.
Y'golonac roars obscenely at you.
Zoth-ommog roars obscenely at you.
Hastur roars horrifically at you.
You climb up the slippery walls and make it partway up. Then you slip and slide down... into a different pit!
The pile of dust on the stone platform coalesces into a grotesque humanoid figure. It rises from the platform!
To your horror, you realize that zombies do not always serve the one who summoned them! Groaning, it shambles toward you.
Nothing happens. You still sense great power in the Elder Sign and you wonder if its power would manifest in a different location.
Out of the sky, a deep booming voice says 'Well done, my child'.
You feel a surge of magical energy, as if you can think more clearly about your spells! You also see that a wooden chest has magically appeared at your feet.

You read some pages that provide insight into the eldritch dealings within this fetid swamp.

"...The well is the key to summoning the Great Ones. At the proper alignment of the stars, we can be assured of success..."

"...The Elder Sign must be kept away from the well at all costs..."

"...Foul ghouls inhabit the tunnels below the pits. No man dares venture down there, as horrific things sleep in those depths..."

Page after page, the hand that created the writings grows shakier. The author appears to have descended into madness. You shudder at horrific thoughts and drop the papers.
The waters of the well are still and nothing happens as you approach. Still, their touch is of death and you dare not come any closer.
There are too many.

Cool green waters close over your head as you sink deeper and deeper. Then, you realize that you are not alone. Two immense evil beings rise out of the depths, thrusting you upward. A shock wave hurls you, dazed and drenched, onto the platform. A horrible ululation comes from the well.
Shrieking in terror, you drop your weapon and flee.
As you stand on the edge of the hummock, an utter silence falls over the swamp. It is as if some eldritch horror is about to descend upon you.
The statue is reduced to a shapeless lump of gold.
The gold statuette begins to vibrate, emitting an unearthly whine. A distant, answering roar seems to come from the well.
The lip of the pit crumbles as you step too near the edge. Gasping, you tumble into darkness.
Surrounded by the cool waters, you know that the madness of this life will leave now. Consciousness slips away like a tiny fish from your grasp.
There is a lurching sensation, a blinding flash, and an echoing boom.
The image of great evils will not fade from your mind, even as your body escapes. A part of your sanity tears away, leaving you unsure of even your most well-honed skills.
You find, as your vision clears, that you are back in the Main Hall tavern. Your waitress hands you the check.
Oh companion of the night, thou who revels in the baying of hounds and spilt blood. Come forth bringing terror to the world. Ai ai, Yog-Sothoth is the gate. By the doom of R'yleh, come forth.
The writing on the stone platform is in a foreign, eldritch tongue. A sudden chill slithers down your spine as you read the words, "YOG-SOTHOTH VIGOR COMMUTARE PULVIS AI AI"
As you complete the incantation, a hush falls over the swamp. The waters of the well begin to stir as if something huge was rising up from unknowable depths.
You feel a sense of great power, but nothing happens.

fields.name: Hastur the Unspeakable
fields.description: Immense and grotesque, a regal figure shrouded in yellow rises from the water. Its vaguely octopoid silhouette blots out the light of the stars. No hope remains, as multiple ropy tentacles reach for you.

fields.name: Zoth-Ommog
fields.description: Out of the pool rises a huge, tentacled being with a cone-shaped body and lizard-like head. Its razor-fanged jaws gape and drool as it stretches out tentacles for you...

fields.name: Y'golonac
fields.description: Glowing, headless, naked, and huge, a bloated humanoid bursts through the brick wall. Wet, fanged mouths gape hungrily from the palms of two monstrous hands as they grasp at you.

fields.name: dimensional shambler
fields.description: Shuffling toward you out of the darkness is the blasphemous form of a thing not at once wholly ape or insect with dead eyes and taloned forepaws widespread. Its mandibles click spasmodically.

fields.name: black Byakhee
fields.description: Perched on an ebon pedestal, an obscene avian nightmare preens long webbed wings with a razor-sharp beak. Its beady red eyes glare at you. It caws raucously at at your approach, and pounces.

fields.name: red Byakhee
fields.description: Alighting on a crimson pedestal, a huge avian horror crows an alarm. Antennae vibrating in anticipation of battle, it spreads long membranous wings and hurls its enormous bulk at you with appalling speed.

fields.name: Byakhee
fields.description: Hovering above the bridge is a winged fiend. It is not altogether mole, crow, ant, nor decomposed human being, but a hideous fusion of all. It shrieks loudly and dives at you with talons extended.

fields.name: Star Vampire
fields.description: A huge, many-tentacled horror, resembling an eldritch flying squid, floats above the platform, feasting on the remains of some dead adventurer. It looks up at you with its bulbous head, emitting an eerie laughter. The Star Vampire reaches for you with its clawed tentacles.

fields.name: Byakhee
fields.description: Howling furiously, a hybrid avian thing rends the stone walk with chitin-armored feet. Membranous wings snap powerfully. Lowering its diabolically beaked head, the Byakhee charges straight for you...

fields.name: slime encrusted zombie
fields.description: Darkened shapes shamble onto the pier. Plainly, you were expected. Long blades glitter in the moonlight. You can make out the dead white faces with red litten eyes. And then, they attack.

fields.name: zombie
fields.description: With a slow lurching gait, demonic light shining out of shrunken eye sockets, the creature approaches. Gaunt chalk-white hands grip a razor sharp sword.

fields.name: strong zombie
fields.description: Clumsily, a mouldering corpse lumbers toward you. Held high in its dreadful grip is a rune-carven stone war hammer that it swings with deadly efficiency.

fields.name: zombie
fields.description: Shambling toward you is an undead being grasping a guttering torch. Its lips are drawn back in a rictus of unholy torment and unspeakable evil. It lifts the torch menacingly and advances.

fields.name: one-armed zombie
fields.description: Lurching out of the shadows towards you is an animated corpse with only one arm. As you ready your weapon, you wonder who or what ripped off its other arm.

fields.name: faceless zombie
fields.description: Stalking you is a horrible apparition, a zombie whose face has been clawed off. In his right hand is a curved dagger.

fields.name: headless zombie
fields.description: Stumbling aimlessly about is a strange sight. It's a zombie without a head. Something must have gone wrong during the resurrection process. Even headless it seems to have detected your presence.

fields.name: protoplasmic blob
fields.description: Slithering toward you from the darkness is a putrescent blob. Is it the result of a failed experiment? you ready your weapon as the thing coils to strike.

fields.name: conjoined zombies
fields.description: How could such a thing come to exist? it's a gross amalgamation of two former human beings. It is as if one human form had skewered another, leaving both alive; that is, alive in the undead fashion of the zombie.

fields.name: legless zombie
fields.description: Crawling towards you, from out of the shadows is an undead creature without any legs. Its dead eyes glitter in the torchlight. Leathery black lips stretch back revealing long yellow fangs.

fields.name: zombie guard
fields.description: Stumbling toward you is a menacing being dressed in a guard's uniform. The zombie thrusts a wicked looking scimitar in the direction of your midsection. It's time to fight or die.

fields.name: albino zombie
fields.description: Lurching down upon you is an albino abomination. Its dead hand clutching a naval officer's cutlass. The moonlight dances along its keen edge and causes the pearl hilt to shimmer like liquid fire.

fields.name: huge zombie
fields.description: In life, that which now stalks toward you must have been an enormous man. But, vacant piggish eyes show nothing of humanity in them now. The huge clawed hands reaching out could crush your head like an eggshell.

fields.name: pale zombie
fields.description: Approaching you is one of the walking dead. Its eyes burn redly like living coals from a fire. Clawed hands reach out as the thing crouches to spring.

fields.name: Abdul
fields.description: Softly, with catlike grace, an man in a turban and long, flowing robes steps out of the shadows. "So, you've come to seal the gate, eh, fool? That's one window not so easily broken." He makes a mystic gesture and red rays blast at you from his palms.

fields.name: Fidavi Isram
fields.description: Blocking your path is a tall, courtly man. His grim visage is a study in cold religious fanaticism. A huge ceremonial sword is cradled in his arms. He assumes an en garde position as you draw near.

fields.name: Yllka
fields.description: A tall, slender woman bars your way. She wears the dark robes of a cultist, her eyes hidden beneath a hood. She draws a sharp dagger from her belt and advances.

fields.name: Hiram
fields.description: A large man in a white turban appears stunned by your presence. Ululating loud battle cries, he snatches up a curved dagger and rushes you.

fields.name: Aisha
fields.description: A young woman approaches you, a sneer curling her upper lip. With great speed, she pulls a dagger from under her robes and attacks.

fields.name: Rashid
fields.description: A young, grim-faced man jumps up from a table and brandishes a dagger. If he can, he will slay you.

fields.name: Aldo
fields.description: Standing here is a teenage boy. His eyes appear tired and have a haunted look. It is clear that he has seen much more than most men twice his age. His hand twitches near the handle of his dagger.

fields.name: Waldo
fields.description: You see another young man, his tired eyes showing the same haunted look as the other initiates. His hand twitches near the handle of his dagger.

fields.name: Naldo
fields.description: A teenage boy stands here, a mere initiate in the eldritch cult of the Great Ones. His eyes have a haunted look, as though he has, despite his youth, seen things that none shall ever speak of. His hand twitches near the handle of his dagger.

fields.name: Bryn
fields.description: Standing here is a young woman wearing the robes of the eldritch cult. She has the same haunted look as the other initiates. Her hand rests nervously on the hilt of her dagger.

fields.name: dejected ghoul
fields.description: Standing before you is a creature that seems to combine most of the aspects of man with those of a canine. Grave mold clings thickly to its matted fur. It is slowly picking its fangs with a fragment of bone.

fields.name: happy ghoul
fields.description: Crouching and whining, a dog-like being fawns at your feet. As you speak to it, you notice its ears lay back and the hackles on its sloping shoulders rise.

fields.name: brave ghoul
fields.description: Scratching its ear with its hind paw, is a creature with disgustingly matted fur. Blue and green molds seem to have taken root on its canine muzzle. A spotted tounge protrudes from its mouth as it pants.

fields.name: Pickman's ghoul
fields.description: Perched on its haunches, a large somber creature awaits your approach. Canine faces are inscrutable, you decide. Its powerful claws flex in anticipation of rending old enemies.

fields.name: ghoul leader
fields.description: Pacing slowly ready for action, is an enormous ghoul. It sniffs the air at your approach. You wonder if its canine grin would be as frightening to others as it is to you.

fields.name: ghoul
fields.description: Sniffing and murmuring, a pack of evil smelling ghouls surround you. You see that two of them are standing by a large, round, carved stone. They appear to be guarding it.

fields.name: fresh zombie
fields.description: Coalescing from the dust is a huge gray zombie. Its red litten eyes glitter and yellow fangs gleam from under twisted, cracked lips.

fields.name: unhappy ghoul
fields.description: Crouched before you is a creature that seems to combine the aspects of both dog and man. Grave mold is matted in its fur. It meeps sullenly.

fields.name: forlorn ghoul
fields.description: Freed, the ghoul seems happier, but still forlorn.

fields.question: How do I use the skiff?
How do I seal the well?
How do I get out of the pits?

fields.answer:
Remember Moloch's advice from the Main Hall:

"Proceed north to the temple and do not stray from the channel. Once there, seek out the Elder Sign, for it is an item of great power and may help to seal the gate that the evil one seeks to open. My sources also speak of a golden statue, believed to contain some great eldritch magic. Destroy it if you can. Beware the guardians lest they bite and catch. Destroy the evil one ere he looses those bound in aeons past. His hour of triumph is nearly come, for when the stars are right, the Great Old Ones will rise again.

Words of power can release tremendous forces, good and evil. To bind forces once unleashed may require reversal. But remember, the act of acquiring knowledge may be hazardous if the knowledge serves the Great Old Ones."
Look closely for secret doors. Try to read anything that looks like an inscription. Words of power hold great potential here.
When you try to move into the river, if the skiff is nearby, you will automatically get in. When you reach the shore, you will automatically get out of the skiff.
As Moloch said, the swamp contains eldritch words in a forgotten tongue. These may even call forth creatures of great power and unspeakable evil.
To summon zombies, find any pile of ill-smelling powder and chant the forbidden words written on the stone slab: "YOG-SOTHOTH VIGOR COMMUTARE PULVIS AI AI"
Should you wish to dispel a foul zombie, say the words in the reverse order: "AI AI PULVIS COMMUTARE VIGOR YOG-SOTHOTH"
Other eldritch summonings may be performed on the platform of the well, or on the summoning platform high atop the pyramidal temple.
The Unspeakable One may be summoned by chanting "OH COMPANION OF THE NIGHT" while in view of the well, while the stars are aligned.
Danger comes to any who bring the golden statuette of Zoth-Ommog too close to the mystic well.

Deep within the bowels of the aeon-forgotten land lies the resting place of something so horrific that even the eldritch priests fear to tread there. Recite the forbidden words written on the wall and your death will be swift.

The Great Old Ones are too powerful for mere mortals to combat. Even the most valiant warrior may as well be fighting against space-time itself. The only way to defeat them is to preserve their eternal slumber.
Restore your saved game, and try to avoid summoning the unspeakable horrors this time. Your fellow adventurers will thank you.
Remember, if your path forward is blocked, or if you foolishly encounter something that should not be, use the amulet to return to the Main Hall.
Heed the words that Moloch told you at the beginning. Seek out secret doors in the temple, for they will provide valuable clues.
You require an ancient artifact of power which is buried deep beneath the temple. Seek out a place with many foul-smelling ghouls.

Find the golden statuette (in the upper floors of the temple) and destroy it (ATTACK STATUETTE). Avoid bringing the statuette to the well unless you fancy meeting its likeness.

Find the pit that contains the horrid Dimensional Shambler. Vanquish this dangerous foe. Seek out a depression in the floor, which conceals a secret tunnel. Descend deep into the earth until you find the Elder Sign. Do not wake Y'golonac, unless a swift death is your fondest desire. Go to the well and cast the powerful Elder Sign into its foul waters. Stand back.
There are five pits in the crypts. All are connected. If you climb up and fall into a different pit, keep trying. Eventually you will discover one that has an exit to the surface.
